Package mmj.lang

Class Chapter

java.lang.Object
mmj.lang.Chapter
public class Chapter extends Object
Chapter is a baby class that provides a way to provide a title for a grouping of Sections.

See BookManager for more details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Chapter

      public Chapter(int chapterNbr, String chapterTitle)
      Sole constructor for Chapter.
      Parameters:
      chapterNbr - is assigned by BookManager.
      chapterTitle - is the extracted descriptive title from the input Metamath database or the default title (must be at least an empty String!)

  • Method Details

      public void storeNewSection(Section section)
      Records the presence of a new Section with a Chapter.
      Parameters:
      section - The new Section in the Chapter.
